Hero.title: Hi, I'm Avan Fabian Daniswara
Hero.subtitle: A passionate developer building web applications.

HomePage.title: IT Specialist
HomePage.description: A versatile IT Specialist with expertise spanning full-stack development, data analysis, and scientific writing. I have designed and optimized backend systems, built cross-platform applications, and developed predictive machine learning models. Beyond engineering, I actively engage in research and academic publication, leveraging data-driven insights to solve real-world problems. I am seeking opportunities to contribute to impactful projects where I can integrate technical innovation with analytical and scholarly excellence.
HomePage.portfolioDescription: A glimpse into my journey in IT and research.

AboutPage.title: About Me
AboutPage.description: A brief introduction about me and my interest.

About.title: Who Am I?
About.name: Avan Fabian Daniswara
About.description: Hello! I'm Avan Fabian Daniswara, a software engineer and a problem-solver at heart. My journey into technology is driven by a simple belief: the most impactful solutions are born from a deep curiosity about the world around us. Originally from Probolinggo and now an Informatics Engineering student at the State University of Malang, I've always been fascinated by the hidden inefficiencies in everyday life—the challenges people accept simply because "that's how it's always been done." This perspective is my starting point for every project: to look beyond the surface and ask, "How can technology make this fundamentally better?" This drive to innovate has led me on an incredible journey. It has guided me in architecting a full-stack platform for a real-world client, developing an award-winning VR/IoT rehabilitation system for a national competition, and building a predictive machine learning model with 85% accuracy. From backend systems in Laravel and AdonisJS to cross-platform mobile apps in Flutter, each project is a testament to my belief in using the right tool for the right problem.

Skills.title: Core Competencies
Skills.subtitle: My technical capabilities at a glance.

profileImageStudio.description: Digital company, providing ERP system and custom software development for business. Implemented customized business logic using AdonisJS for creative economy actors, automated questionnaire assessment data recapitulation, designed normalized PostgreSQL schema, wrote API docs in Postman, collaborated with DevOps, and implemented RBAC authorization.

sealab.description: Digital company, providing ERP system and custom software development for business. Windows Server setup, LDAP & AD configuration, IAM & CIAM implementation, Okta IdP for SSO, and data security for business continuity.

scpMentor.description: Student innovation and research program funded by the Indonesian Ministry of Education. Mentored teams, oversaw proposal writing, research, and presentations, and provided strategic input for project feasibility and impact.

gdgocMl.description: University based Technology Community Program supported by Google. Led final projects, collaborated across technical divisions, and delivered ML/AI learning materials in Study Jam sessions.

idxPartner.description: Project Based Internship program by Rakamin Academy with industry partner ID/X Partners. Developed ML model for loan default risk prediction, performed feature engineering, and implemented XGBoost with Scikit-learn.

gdscMl.description: University based Community Program supported by Google. Delivered ML/AI learning materials in Study Jam sessions and guided students in practical ML/AI applications.

Education.title: Education
Education.subtitle: Get to know more about my educational background.
Education.description: Aspiring to be a software engineer, I am currently pursuing a bachelor's degree in computer science at Universitas Negeri Malang. Fascinated by the world of technology, I am eager to learn and explore new things in the field of computer science.

goldMedal.title: UM Gold Medal Tech & Trade Expo 2024
goldMedal.description: Architected a web-based invoicing platform to digitize MSME financial processes, integrating Gemini API for a smart suggestion feature to improve business product development.

silverMedal.title: Silver Medal, 37th National Scientific Week (PIMNAS)
silverMedal.description: Architected an innovative rehabilitation system and successfully presented its technical framework and user benefits to a national panel of judges.

funding.title: Funding Recipient, National Student Creativity Program (PKM-KC)
funding.description: Secured national R&D funding by designing and proposing an innovative system for post-stroke rehabilitation using Virtual Reality (VR) and IoT.

english.title: Certificate of English Proficiency (CEFR B2 Equivalent)
english.description: Issued by the State University of Malang with a PBT-equivalent score of 487.

Quote.text1: There are no limits to what you can accomplish
Quote.text2: except the limits you place on your own thinking.

ProjectsPage.title: My Projects
ProjectsPage.description: List of my projects that I have done and currently working on.

dashboardEkraf.title: Dashboard Ekraf : Southeast Sulawesi Creative Economy Platform
dashboardEkraf.description: Architected and developed a comprehensive backend system for Southeast Sulawesi's creative economy platform using AdonisJS and PostgreSQL. Built secure RESTful APIs and implemented automated data processing workflows to support digital transformation initiatives for local creative businesses.
dashboardEkraf.responsibility1: Custom questionnaire module with dynamic form generation and validation for collecting business data from creative economy actors.
dashboardEkraf.responsibility2: Automated reporting dashboard that transforms raw survey data into comprehensive stakeholder reports with data visualization.
dashboardEkraf.responsibility3: User management system with role-based access control for administrators, surveyors, and business owners.
dashboardEkraf.responsibility4: Real-time analytics dashboard providing insights on survey completion rates, response patterns, and business distribution.

dashboardEkraf.title: Dashboard Ekraf
dashboardEkraf.desc1: Architected and developed the backend system for a digital platform to support creative economy actors, focusing on a custom questionnaire and data recapitulation module.
dashboardEkraf.desc2: Implemented a secure RESTful API using AdonisJS and designed a normalized PostgreSQL schema, which automated data processing and improved data accuracy for stakeholders.

sincosmile.title: Sincosmile
sincosmile.desc1: Architected and developed the platform's core features, including the automated scoring engine and a Role-Based Access Control system to manage user permissions.
sincosmile.desc2: Leveraged Supabase as a Backend-as-a-Service to accelerate development, and optimized PostgreSQL queries, resulting in a significant improvement in data retrieval efficiency for the assessment feature.

motherApp.title: Mother App
motherApp.desc1: Developed a comprehensive mobile application for maternal health monitoring using Flutter, featuring real-time health tracking and educational resources.
motherApp.desc2: Implemented secure data synchronization and offline capabilities to ensure continuous access to critical health information for expectant mothers.

neurehab.title: NeuroRehab VR
neurehab.desc1: Designed and developed an innovative Virtual Reality system for post-stroke rehabilitation, integrating IoT sensors for real-time patient monitoring.
neurehab.desc2: Successfully secured national R&D funding by proposing a comprehensive solution that combines immersive VR therapy with data-driven rehabilitation protocols.

rumahSalad.title: Rumah Salad Faqiha
rumahSalad.desc1: Designed and developed a web application to digitize core business operations such as order management, customer data and inventory tracking.
rumahSalad.desc2: Resulting in productivity boost for the business owner through streamlined digital processes and automated workflow management.

jelajahNusantara.title: JelajahNusantara
jelajahNusantara.desc1: An immersive educational platform celebrating Indonesian cultural heritage.
jelajahNusantara.desc2: Developed with Laravel, featuring interactive elements and rich content delivery for an engaging user experience in cultural learning.

denkmeister.title: Denkmeister
denkmeister.desc1: Developed a cross-platform mobile application from concept to completion using Flutter, focusing on an offline-first architecture to ensure seamless user access without an internet connection.
denkmeister.desc2: Implemented an efficient local data structure using JSON Assets and managed the application's state with Provider resulting in a responsive and stable user experience.

bunya.title: BUNYA: Buat Senyawa
bunya.desc1: BUNYA is an award-winning educational game. As a 3rd Place Winner at the Electrical & Informatics Engineering Student Research Festival held by Universitas Negeri Malang.
bunya.desc2: This project teaches players about chemical elements, compounds, and laboratory equipment by blending engaging fantasy elements with real-world scientific principles.

creditRisk.title: Credit Risk Prediction & Scoring System
creditRisk.desc1: Developed an end-to-end machine learning model to predict credit risk, achieving 85% accuracy in identifying high-risk loan applications.
creditRisk.desc2: Engineered predictive features from historical lending data and utilized XGBoost and Scikit-learn to build and evaluate the classification model, forming the core of the scoring system.

neurehab.description: Neurehab is a Karsa Cipta (KC) research and development project that successfully obtained national funding from the Ministry of Education, Culture, Research, and Technology through the Student Creativity Program (PKM). This project focuses on the design and development of an integrated post-stroke rehabilitation system that combines Virtual Reality (VR), Internet of Things (IoT), and mobile applications. The project was further developed and won a Silver Medal at the 37th PIMNAS.
neurehab.roleTitle: As the Researcher & Developer, I was responsible for:

mother.title: Mother : Pregnancy Wellness & Fitness Monitoring App
mother.description: A comprehensive pregnancy wellness mobile application built with Flutter and Laravel, designed to support urban pregnant women in managing their health journey while addressing obesity-related risks during pregnancy.

implementations.backend: Laravel backend API with secure authentication and data encryption for handling sensitive health information.
implementations.mobile: Flutter mobile interface with intuitive forms for daily health logging, weight tracking, and appointment scheduling.
implementations.dashboard: Personalized dashboard featuring progress charts, health insights, and customized recommendations based on user data.
implementations.notifications: Notification system for medication reminders, appointment alerts, and milestone celebrations throughout pregnancy.
